coreAttributes.name: chastity belt
coreAttributes.description: A chastity belt, designed to deny access to the wearer's vagina. A hole in the rear strap provides access to the wearer's asshole.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] on the chastity belt and [npc.verb(clip)] the locks into place.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the chastity belt up around [npc2.namePos] groin, before clipping the locks into place.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] the chastity belt up around [npc2.namePos] groin, before forcefully clipping the locks into place.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] the chastity belt's locks and [npc.verb(take)] it off.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unfasten)] the locks on [npc2.namePos] chastity belt and [npc.verb(take)] it off.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] hastily [npc.verb(unfasten)] the locks on [npc2.namePos] chastity belt and [npc.verb(yank)] it off.
